original_text: Which may go out before them, and which may go in before them, and which may lead them out, and which may bring them in; that the congregation of the Lord be not as sheep which have no shepherd.
korean_text: 그로 그들 앞에 출입하며 그들을 인도하여 출입하게 하사 여호와의 회중이 목자 없는 양과 같이 되지 않게 하옵소서

sentences.original_text: Which may go out before them
and which may go in before them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 앞으로 들어오게 할 자

sentences.original_text: and which may lead them out
and which may bring them in
that the congregation of the Lord

sentences.korean_translation: 목자가 없는 양과 같지 않게 하기 위함
